title: Inception
tagline: Your mind is the scene of the crime.
overview: A skilled thief uses dream-sharing technology to pull off intricate heists inside people's minds.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind bent on creating havoc and chaos in Gotham City.

title: Interstellar
tagline: Mankind's next step will be our greatest.
overview: A team of scientists and astronauts venture through a wormhole to find a new home for humanity.

title: Forrest Gump
tagline: Life is like a box of chocolates.
overview: The touching life story of Forrest Gump, a kind and simple man with extraordinary achievements.

title: The Matrix
overview: A computer hacker discovers the true nature of reality and joins a rebellion against oppressive forces.

title: Gladiator
overview: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge while fighting his way to freedom as a gladiator.

title: Pulp Fiction
tagline: Just because you are a character doesn't mean you have character.
overview: The lives of hitmen, a boxer, and gangsters intertwine in a chaotic world of violence and redemption.

title: Avatar
overview: A former Marine is sent to Pandora, where he joins the native Na'vi in their fight to protect their world.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over the years, forging a friendship that inspires hope and a quest for freedom.

title: The Godfather
overview: The patriarch of a powerful crime family passes responsibility to his son during times of betrayal and turmoil.
